act.title: Dialog Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 小姐，我想把我的行李寄存在这儿。
item.pinyin: Xiǎojǐe, wǒ xiǎng bǎ wǒ de xínglǐ jìcún zài zhèr.

item.hanzi: 好的，先生，您要寄存多久？
item.pinyin: Hǎo de, xiānsheng, nín yào jìcún duō jiǔ?

item.hanzi: 好，半天50元，这是您的行李牌，请收好
item.pinyin: Hǎo, bàntiān wǔ shí yuán, zhè shì nín de xínglǐ pái, qǐng shōu hǎo.
